message: Send them all back!!
Imho pointing out problems wakes people to the reality and might trigger a consciousness shift

If anything, evolution is evidence of a divine order. There really isn't any other way for it to have worked. Random chance is too random to have worked so well so quickly. People that truly understand science are some of the most certain of us that there is a God, a creator, an artificer. If the beauty of creating a world like ours over billions of years isn't more powerful to you than doing it in seven days, you need to reevaluate your perspective.
Great ruling!!!!

This is the era of Internet. Everything you post online will no longer be """"privately"""" yours anymore, that's the harsh truth. The other day, I read news about Taiwanese woman who claimed her life and career are ruined from one picture that is circulated as a meme. I bet more will come forward to claim that their lives have been negatively affected by the multiplication of digital content that has them in it.

Dear Santa, please don't bother visiting the Netherlands this Xmas. The one and only Sinterklaas already brought us tons of presents on December 5th. You know we consider you a cheep Cola-copy anyway. Apart from that, the reindeer-stuff you do is cool. But please give the Dutch present to the children in Syria and Jemen
